name: Weekly Elite Hunting
info: Hunt down powerful elite monsters that appear once a week.
dialogs: Hunter, we have reports of an elite monster in the region.
This creature is far more dangerous than usual prey.
It has claimed many victims already this week.
Only the strongest hunters dare to face such beasts.
If you succeed, the guild will reward you handsomely.
The monster was last seen near the ancient ruins.
Will you accept this dangerous hunt?
